summary: This is an internal email from July 15, 2019, within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The sender, unable to access PACER, inquires if a recently posted document concerning Jeffrey Epstein's finances was submitted by his defense counsel. It highlights internal coordination regarding public case filings.

events.title: Internal Inquiry on Epstein Financial Document
events.description: An email is sent within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a document about Jeffrey Epstein's finances that was just posted, questioning if it was submitted by defense counsel.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 15, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
It references a publicly posted document concerning Jeffrey Epstein's finances.
The inquiry originates from within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating active internal monitoring of case filings.
The sender speculates the financial document may have been submitted by Epstein's defense counsel.
